text: The Syracuse Crunch are an American professional Ice hockey team that began playing in 1994. They currently play in the American Hockey League and are the farm team of the Anaheim Ducks of the NHL. They play their home games in Syracuse, New York at the War Memorial at Oncenter. Their ECHL affiliate team is the Elmira Jackals. ==Other websites== *Syracuse Crunch's Official Site Category:American Hockey League teams Category:Anaheim Ducks Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Syracuse, New York Category:1994 establishments in the United States Category:1990s establishments in New York (state)
title: Syracuse Crunch
